results.title: Angiooedema and urticaria with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors.
results.text_hl: Angiooedema and @<m>DISEASE_Urticaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014581 @@@urticaria@@@ with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors.

citations.NLM: Pillans PI, Coulter DM, Black P. Angiooedema and urticaria with angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 1996;51(2):123-6. PMID: 8911875

results.title: Comparison of the efficacy and tolerability of lisinopril and sustained-release verapamil in black patients with hypertension.
results.text_hl: Six @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were excluded from maintenance therapy: four in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ group (one because of @<m>DISEASE_Urticaria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014581 @@@urticaria@@@ and three because of failure to reach goal blood pressure) and two in the verapamil SR group (because of failure to reach goal blood pressure).

citations.NLM: Weir MR, Kong BW, Jenkins P, Lavin PT. Comparison of the efficacy and tolerability of lisinopril and sustained-release verapamil in black patients with hypertension. Clin Ther. 1991 May-Jun;13(3):409-16. PMID: 1659495
